30720953138123300.Text: Whatever trick this is... You'll taste my spells.

3953214983021829582.Text: The Morag Tong is weak! I shall defeat you!

2545120377597030349.Text: The Morag Tong will pay for this insult!

18027327602606020970.Text: The Morag Tong! They found me! Help! Please... spare me!

243065022205014868.Text: Whatever it is, it can wait for another day. Goodbye.

1935914985132526094.Text: I'm sorry. I busy right now.

2363816523715520806.Text: You're no match for me, Morag Tong puppy!

1478925705354615614.Text: What? No... You're from the Morag Tong! You won't take me!

2891024981631431983.Text: I don't like the way you've been looking at me.

30280283662079432101.Text: I've worked with those brothers for years. I won't let you get away with this!

1186073741515428430.Text: I've worked with those brothers for years. I won't let you get away with this!

2425636923061727085.Text: Killing my best men was a mistake, %PCName.

6812526555353372.Text: You... you're from the Morag Tong. You... you must be here to kill Toris.

184181963819476965.Text: I want no part of this. Good day.

14367256971364129203.Text: You're from the Morag Tong, aren't you? Mavon Drenim is upstairs, but she's been expecting you. Don't tell her I warned you.

1593114301531216394.Text: So you've finally arrived. I will not interfere.

169451442863529418.Text: I can't officially take any action against you, but you killed a fellow Hlaalu, and I will not forget it.

26139704971782004.Text: Just... just... get out of my club.

302946901316717399.Text: I liked Guril Retheran, but I don't want any trouble with the Morag Tong.

25275185601460422327.Text: Whatever you're doing here is none of my business. Just don't take anything that's not yours.

264877156181401916.Text: I don't care who you are. If you ever do anything like that in my club again, you'll be sorry.

1580118447388516444.Text: I don't know who you are or what argument you had with Feruren, but I want no part of it.

22456302552493218521.Text: You are afflicted with corprus disease. I am a healer, but I know of no cure for corprus.

2459744711613417630.Text: You are afflicted with corprus disease. I am an apothecary, but I know of no cure for corprus.

7531100241144824737.Text: I'm sorry, %PCRank %PCName, but you are afflicted with a blight disease. I am an apothecary. Among other services, I sell a potion that cures all blight diseases. Members of your rank may also receive the free blessing of a cure by visiting a Temple shrine. A blessing costs you nothing, but a potion may be carried for convenient use.

13915160073220112677.Text: I'm sorry, %PCRank %PCName, but you are afflicted with a blight disease. I am an apothecary. Among other services, I sell a potion that cures all blight diseases. Members of your rank may also receive the blessing of a cure by visiting a Temple shrine and making a small offering. A blessing costs less than a potion, but a potion may be carried for convenient use.

6701191921002325565.Text: I'm sorry, %PCRank %PCName, but you are afflicted with a blight disease. I am an apothecary. Among other services, I sell a potion that cures all blight diseases. A blessing costs less than a potion, but a potion may be carried for convenient use.

249722919855815363.Text: You are afflicted with a common disease. I am a healer. Among other services, I sell a potion that cures all common diseases. You can also receive the blessing of a cure by visiting a Temple shrine and making an offering. A blessing costs less than a potion, but a potion may be carried for convenient use.

18758287621369452.Text: You are afflicted with a common disease. I am a healer. Among other services, I sell a potion that cures all common diseases. You can also receive the blessing of a cure by visiting an Imperial cult altar and making an offering. A blessing costs less than a potion, but a potion may be carried for convenient use.

1288517901243824856.Text: You are afflicted with a common disease. I am a healer. Among other services, I sell a potion that cures all common diseases. You can also receive the blessing of a cure by visiting an Imperial cult altar or Temple shrine and making an offering. A blessing costs less than a potion, but a potion may be carried for convenient use.

10308520230675868.Text: You bear the corprus curse, outlander. There is no cure but death. Take yourself to a quiet place and prepare yourself for the end.

1987015913852530702.Text: You're got corprus disease, outlander. That's a death sentence. It can't get cured. Get away from me. FAR away.

309246435315996737.Text: Hey! Get away from me! You've got corprus disease! You can't get cured of corprus! Get aWAY!

692226221902217465.Text: Keep your distance, outlander. You are marked by blight disease. Go to a wise woman or trader. They have potions that cure such curses.

12630280742683631664.Text: Keep your distance, outlander. Can't you tell you're sick? And you've got a blight disease. You're a danger to everyone. Go find an Imperial cult altar or a Temple shrine, or a healer or apothecary, and get cured.

217715949323862811.Text: You're got a blight disease, outlander. Get away from me. And go get cured, or STAY away from me.

1437410127118847631.Text: Not so close! I don't want to catch what you've got. And you've got a blight disease. You're a danger to everyone. You must find an Imperial cult altar or a Temple shrine, or see a healer or apothecary, and get yourself cured. Otherwise, no one is going to talk to you.

18990189992207523438.Text: Hey! Get away from me! Don't you know you're sick? And you've got a blight disease. You're a danger to everyone. Go find an Imperial cult altar or a Temple shrine, or a healer or apothecary, and get cured.

877212577140769683.Text: You are unclean, outlander. You have touched some diseased thing. It is only a common disease, but you must see a wise woman or trader and get a potion to cure it.

53842651108524245.Text: I'm sorry, friend, but I think you have managed to get a common disease of some sort. You can get that cured by visiting a Temple shrine, or an Imperial cult altar, or by buying a potion from a healer or apothecary.

219451494910238106.Text: Keep your distance, outlander. Can't you tell you're sick? I don't want to catch your disease. You should get cured, or no one will want to talk with you. Go find an Imperial cult altar or a Temple shrine, or see a healer or an apothecary.

164651982224103597.Text: You're unclean, outlander. Get away from me. And go get cured, or stay away from me.

73034862212212737.Text: I'm sorry you're not feeling well, but you need to get cured of that disease. I think it's just a common disease, and if you go to an Imperial cult altar or a Temple shrine, or see a healer or apothecary, I'm sure they can take care of it.

2188619576183329891.Text: Not so close! I don't want to catch what you've got. It's just a common disease, but you need to find an Imperial cult altar or a Temple shrine, or see a healer or apothecary, and get yourself cured. Otherwise, no one is going to talk to you.

1312313470517918122.Text: Hey! Get away from me! Don't you know you're sick? It's just a common disease. Go find an Imperial cult altar or a Temple shrine, or a healer or apothecary, and get cured.

2605131512188323420.Text: Personally, %PCName, I really respect you. But you are a notorious outlaw, and until you have cleared your name, or paid your debt to society, I will become increasingly reluctant to associate with you.

10892597398701449.Text: If you have been seen carrying out the Morag Tong's orders, you should speak with a guard and present your writs. Your crimes will be cleared.

13666162131264821855.Text: Personally, %PCName, I really respect you. But you are a notorious outlaw, and until you have cleared your name, or paid your debt to society, I will become increasingly reluctant to associate with you.

3134028020260168750.Text: Personally, %PCName, I really respect you. But you are a notorious outlaw, and until you have cleared your name, or paid your debt to society, I will become increasingly reluctant to associate with you.

2083372831974327180.Text: Yes? Is this about that work we discussed earlier?

14064224683174427359.Text: Personally, %PCName, I really respect you. But you are a notorious outlaw, and until you have cleared your name, or paid your debt to society, I will become increasingly reluctant to associate with you.

2118970791704128723.Text: We will have nothing to do with a notorious outlaw. Until you have cleared your name, or paid your debt to society, don't talk to us.

2713117172612110286.Text: We will have nothing to do with a notorious outlaw. Until you have cleared your name, or paid your debt to society, don't talk to us.

96122919404920193.Text: We will have nothing to do with a notorious outlaw. Until you have cleared your name, or paid your debt to society, don't talk to us.

12560149042482210158.Text: The Morag Tong does not respect those who debase the sacred art of murder.

2689112858236774173.Text: We will have nothing to do with a notorious outlaw. Until you have cleared your name, or paid your debt to society, don't talk to us.

25044215512484215955.Text: What are you? A savage barbarian? The Mages Guild is a civilized society of scholars, not a dark coven of necromancers and outlaws. We are very disappointed in you. Either you clear your name of these crimes, or pay your debt to society, or we will have to deny you shelter or services.

62773153919433452.Text: What are you? A savage barbarian? The Mages Guild is a civilized society of scholars, not a dark coven of necromancers and outlaws. We are very disappointed in you. Either you clear your name of these crimes, or pay your debt to society, or we will have to deny you shelter or services.

2487219107717122917.Text: With such a high price on your head, everyone assumes you are a murderer. %Name don't know the details, and don't want to know. But %Faction won't be pleased. We're judged by your actions, and we don't need thugs like you getting us a reputation as murderers.

2634030454112326949.Text: This bad person who threatens Ahnassi, this Daren Adryn is... not around any more? And, so because you share a care with Ahnassi, you have such price on your head? This is wrong. You do this for Ahnassi. Ahnassi has friends, calls in favors... promises she will set this thing right.

25565308491000422213.Text: With such a high price on your head, everyone assumes you are a murderer. %Name don't know the details, and don't want to know. But %Faction won't be pleased. We're judged by your actions, and we don't need thugs like you getting us a reputation as murderers.

28747795748431438.Text: With such a high price on your head, everyone assumes you are a murderer. I don't know the details, and don't want to know. But %Faction won't be pleased. We're judged by your actions, and we don't need thugs like you getting us a reputation as murderers.

11339160892159422745.Text: With such a high price on your head, everyone assumes you are a murderer. I don't know the details, and don't want to know. But %Faction won't be pleased. We're judged by your actions, and we don't need thugs like you getting us a reputation as murderers.

11128184332371713781.Text: You have a price on your head. A very high price. Go see a guard and see your name is cleared. If you're going to be stupid, or careless, be prepared to pay the price.

17772755227103419.Text: You are a notorious outlaw among your people. That means nothing to us. We know killing very well. But you walk a thin line with us, outlander. So walk very carefully.

234062858210319067.Text: I know you. You're %PCName. The notorious outlaw.... Let me outta here.

26088221171563722505.Text: I know you. You're %PCName, the notorious outlaw. Look. I don't want any trouble. But you're scaring me. And I can't think straight when I'm scared.

1844147142793817211.Text: I know you. You're %PCName, the notorious outlaw. Look. I don't want any trouble. But you're scaring me. And I can't think straight when I'm scared.

3137517782452216666.Text: You've got the corprus! There's no cure for that, is there?

64112221151328222.Text: You've got blight disease! Get that taken care of soon, %PCName. You're the only case I've seen on this island.

8352326641972922837.Text: You don't look well at all. If you're sick, you'd better get over to the Imperial Shrine at Fort Frostmoth.

13274327042421813297.Text: You look like you're dying, and I've never seen anyone with that sort of disease. I don't know what it is, but you look to be dying. Leave here.

123713295221866961.Text: You're sick, but I've never seen this disease before. You must have brought it with you to this place. Get it cured fast.

273883016857314194.Text: You reek of disease. You should get yourself cured of whatever it is that ails you.

3018246623089423838.Text: There's a great sickness within you, the likes of which I have never seen. You should leave this place.

549864071733421954.Text: You've got a disease that I've not seen before. It must have been brought here by you or one of the Imperials. Get it cured. Now. We don't want your diseases in this place.

19235219952823510202.Text: You're not well. You should get yourself cured.

819615761107918288.Text: You've got the corprus! Stay away from me. I've heard there's no cure for that. You should head back to Vvardenfell. We don't need that at the fort.

1034726904914619488.Text: You've got the blight disease, %PCName. Must have picked it up on Vvardenfell. You'll want to get that taken care of quickly.

1173287252973024123.Text: You're not looking so good. Sick, I mean. You probably want to go to the Imperial Shrine and get that taken care of.

1141851691554626362.Text: What the...? You're sick, and I don't want whatever it is you've got!

25061156971599210978.Text: You've got the blight disease. You must have come over here recently from the big island, %PCRace. Get that taken care of. We don't need it around here.

2170032630754526042.Text: You've got some sort of disease, %PCRace. Something's just not right with you. And that's not a good sign around here.
